Package oitkmg.project2

Class GymManager

java.lang.Object
oitkmg.project2.GymManager
public class GymManager extends Object
GymManager operates the usage of several commands to maintain and display a Gym.
Author:
Kevin George, Omar Talaat

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Called to start accepting inputs the GymManager. This function will run continuously until the Quit command is used to stop the program. Inputs are accepted at any time this function is running. Inputs include: 
      
 "A"
      - Description -> Add a member to the database with expiration
          date in 3 months. This is a standard member.
      - Usage -> A FirstName LastName DateOfBirth Location
 "R"
      - Description -> Remove a member from the database.
      - Usage -> R FirstName LastName DateOfBirth
 "P"
      - Description -> Print a list of the members in the database in
          current position.
 "PC"
      - Description -> Print a list of the members in the database
          ordered by County, and ZIP code.
 "PN"
      - Description -> Print a list of the members in the database
          ordered by last name, and first name.
 "PD"
      - Description -> Print a list of the members in the database
          ordered by expiration date.
 "S"
      - Description -> Print the fitness class schedule and the
          members checked in.
 "C"
      - Description -> Check in a member to a fitness class.
      - Usage -> C ClassName FirstName LastName DateOfBirth
 "D"
      - Description -> Check out a member from a fitness class.
      - Usage -> D ClassName FirstName LastName DateOfBirth
 "LS"
      - Description -> Load the fitness class schedule from the file
          "classSchedule.txt" to the class schedule software system.
 "LM"
      - Description -> Load the list of members from the file
          "memberList.txt" to the member database.
 "AF"
      - Description -> Add a member with the family membership to
          the membership database. Membership expires 3 months later.
      - Usage -> FirstName LastName DateOfBirth Location
 "AP"
      - Description -> Add a member with the premium membership to
          the membership database. Membership expires 1 year later.
      - Usage -> FirstName LastName DateOfBirth Location
 "PF"
      - Description -> Prints a list of all members including their
          calculated membership fees.
 "CG"
      - Description -> Family guest check-in for a fitness class.
          Uses one guest pass. Can't be used by standard member.
      - Usage -> ClassName Instructor Location FirstName LastName
          DateOfBirth
 "DG"
      - Description -> Family guest check-out for a fitness class.
          Adds one guest pass.
      - Usage -> ClassName Instructor Location FirstName LastName
          DateOfBirth
 "Q"
      - Description -> Exit Gym Manager.

    • addPremiumMember

      private void addPremiumMember(String fname, String lname, Date dob, String loc)
      Add member with the premium membership.
      Parameters:
      fname - the member's first name.
      lname - the member's last name.
      dob - the member's date of birth.
      loc - the member's gym location.

    • addFamilyMember

      private void addFamilyMember(String fname, String lname, Date dob, String loc)
      Add member with the family membership.
      Parameters:
      fname - the member's first name.
      lname - the member's last name.
      dob - the member's date of birth.
      loc - the member's gym location.

    • loadMembers

      private void loadMembers()
      Loads the legacy members from "memberList.txt"

    • loadFitnessSchedule

      private void loadFitnessSchedule()
      Loads the fitness class schedule.

    • resetScanner

      private Scanner resetScanner(String fileName)
      Resets the scanner with specified file name.
      Parameters:
      fileName - file name to reset the scanner with.
      Returns:
      a Scanner object that uses the fileName.

    • addMember

      private void addMember(String fname, String lname, Date dob, String loc)
      Called to add a member to the database. If a member enters an invalid calendar date for date of birth, a date of birth in the future, a member who's under 18 years of age, an invalid calendar date for expiration date, or an invalid gym location the method will return and print the reason for terminating; Otherwise, the member will be added to the database.
      Parameters:
      fname - the member's first name.
      lname - the member's last name.
      dob - the member's date of birth.
      loc - the member's gym location.

    • isEighteenOrOlder

      private boolean isEighteenOrOlder(Date dob, Date now)
      Used to determine if the date of birth of a member is 18 years or older.
      Parameters:
      dob - a Date object that represents the date of birth of a member.
      now - a Date object that represents the current date.
      Returns:
      true if the date of birth is 18 years or older; false otherwise.

    • removeMember

      private void removeMember(String[] inputs)
      Called to remove a member from the database. If the member is not in the database then the user will be notified. If the member is in the database then the member will be checked out of all fitness classes too.
      Parameters:
      inputs - command inputs used to create a member object.

    • printFitnessClassSchedule

      private void printFitnessClassSchedule()
      Prints the fitness class schedule and its corresponding members/guests that are checked in. For each fitness class, its class name, instructor, and class time will be printed.

    • printClass

      private String printClass(FitnessClass fitnessClass)
      Prints the fitness classes participants. This includes the members and the guests.
      Parameters:
      fitnessClass - The fitness class to be represented by a string.
      Returns:
      a string representing the fitness class' members and guests.

    • checkInMember

      private void checkInMember(String[] inputs)
      Checks in a member to a fitness class. If the date of birth input is invalid, the member does not exist, the member's expiration date is expired, or class name inputted does not exist the method will return and the user will be notified why.
      Parameters:
      inputs - command inputs used to create a member object.

    • getMemberJoinClassResponse

      private String getMemberJoinClassResponse(String className, String instructor, String town, Member member)
      Called to add a member to a fitness class given they meet all the qualifications to. This class will return a string based on whether the member was able to join the class.
      Parameters:
      member - member that is requested to be checked in.
      className - class name the member wishes to join.
      town - town of the gym location.
      instructor - instructor of the class.
      Returns:
      a string representing a confirmation or error joining message

    • checkInGuest

      private void checkInGuest(String[] inputs)
      Checks in a guest to a fitness class. Prints success or failure to join class reason.
      Parameters:
      inputs - The parent member of the guest that wishes to join the class.

    • checkOutGuest

      private void checkOutGuest(String[] inputs)
      Checks out a guest from a fitness class. Called with the assumption the guest is present in the fitness class.
      Parameters:
      inputs - command inputs used to create a member object.

    • isTimeConflict

      private boolean isTimeConflict(Member member, FitnessClass newClass)
      Determines if there is a time conflict for a member joining a class. There is a time conflict if the member is checked into another fitness class that happens during the same time slot.
      Parameters:
      member - Member to be evaluated.
      newClass - fitness class the member wishes to join.
      Returns:
      true if there is a time conflict; false otherwise.

    • checkOutMember

      private void checkOutMember(String[] inputs)
      Checks out a member from a fitness class. If the date of birth input is invalid, member is not checked in, or the class name inputted does not exist the method will return and the user will be notified why.
      Parameters:
      inputs - command inputs used to create a member object.

    • memberLeaveClassResponse

      private String memberLeaveClassResponse(String className, String instructor, String town, Member member)
      Gets the response for when a member tries to leave a class.
      Parameters:
      className - class name of the fitness class.
      instructor - instructor of the fitness class.
      town - town of the fitness class.
      member - member of the fitness class.
      Returns:
      a String representing the success or failure of the member attempting to leave the class.

    • errorJoinOrLeave

      private boolean errorJoinOrLeave(String className, String instructor, String town)
      Gets the error message for a member joining or leaving a fitness class.
      Parameters:
      className - class name of the fitness class.
      instructor - instructor of the fitness class.
      town - town of the fitness class.
      Returns:
      true if there was an error joining the class; false otherwise.
